item.title: PPV Direct VOD
item.link:
$doregex[rtmp]/dvd playpath=$doregex[file] swfUrl=http://ppvdirect.com/player/player-licensed.swf timeout=10 pageUrl=http://ppvdirect.com/view.php?pg=live
rtmp streamer=([^']*)/dvd http://ppvdirect.com/view.php?pg=dvd45
file file=([^']*).flv http://ppvdirect.com/view.php?pg=dvd45
